name: Get Patient
query: query GetPatient($id: ID!) { patient(id: $id) { id firstName lastName email } }

name: Create Patient
query: mutation CreatePatient($input: CreatePatientInput!) { createPatient(input: $input) { patient { id email } errors } }

name: Search Patients
query: query SearchPatients($criteria: PatientSearchInput!) { searchPatients(criteria: $criteria) { id firstName lastName email } }
